name: Legends of Etherell: Antavia
blurb: Legends of Etherell is a next-generation "Massively Mutli-player Role Playing Experience" that brings classic RPG gameplay online.

rewards.reward: Recruit: We\u2019ll provide you with a downloadable copy of the ALPHA version of the game once it's available. Be one of the first to play a fighter, thief or mage as a Human, Dwarf or Elf. These are the founding races in Etherell and the launching test platform for the game. We\u2019d be proud to hear your comments and feedback too about how it is going and to celebrate reaching our first true playable milestone. You will also receive the "Recruit" medallion.

Earl: You\u2019ll get full access to playtest ALPHA and receive an exclusive LoE printed lithograph made from a rare pencil drawing incorporating some of the most pivotal characters in the game. The litho will also come with signatures from the game creator Aaron Victoria and fellow SilverHelm Studios Co-founder Art Director and artist, Chad Dulac. You will also receive all entitlements to this point and receive the "Earl" medallion.

Conqueror: You\u2019ll receive the initial wave of premium in-game content along with your ALPHA access. Most importantly, you will gain first access to the first BETA release before any one else. Be one of our front line game testers to put our game through rigorous testing; gaining early access to access to a majority of the premium content including all playable races, classes, weapons, and armors. Conquerors will also gain access to view the private developer forums on the LoE website throughout the production of the game available only through www.legends-of-etherell.com. You will also receive all entitlements to this point and receive the "Conqueror" medallion.

King: The game is more than just leveling up and questing. More than just glory and fame! The game is about fun and what better way to have fun than to spice up the look of your character with a very distinct look? LoE: Antavia features an online marketplace where players are able purchasable and download content. Want to make your own exclusive armor set unlike anything that can be bought? Becoming a King earns you this benefit. Our Art Director, Chad Dulac, will design anything you can imagine. Whether it's a playboy bunny outfit, a Santa set, leather speedos, and crystal pajamas... Your creativity is his only limit. We will create your special costumes for that you can sell, or equip, and you can get to design it! We\u2019ll take your costume idea and put it into the game and you\u2019ll get your own self- created character costume for the life of your game account with LOE or until you decide to sell it.  You will also receive all entitlements to this point and the "King" medallion.

Emperor: As an Emperor you've earned access to the ALPHA, the early BETA, the signed lithograph, developer forum access, and the rights to design your own exclusive armor/clothes set. Are you still looking for more? Great, because we have more to offer! There are plenty of location throughout Antavia where players need to rest, have a drink, or gear up for that next set of quests. What better way to do that than to stop at YOUR tavern, armor shop, inn or cathedral? Emperors earn the right to choose the name of a tavern, armor shop, inn or cathedral/church/deity worship domain and have it written into production. You\u2019ll even get an exclusive digital copy of a map of Antavia that shows right where your structure has been built, and digital copies/screenshots of your building within the game. Help scribe you name into the history of LoE and maybe stop in at \u201cyour place for a spell.\u201d You will also receive all entitlements to this point and receive the "Emperor" medallion. (Note structures/location names cannot violate copyright, trademark or any intellectual property.)

Master: LOE is ripe with craftsmen of all shapes and colors. There are tons of items that we need to make for these craftsmen. Masters will be able to name an item from one of our in-game professions, as well as help our art team decide on its final look. After you\u2019ve got a name picked out for your hammer of hilariousness, Phil\u2019s ridiculously handsome tonic or your boots of bunnyness, we\u2019ll even make a custom icon so you can know it\u2019s yours when you see it. Contributors will receive a high resolution image of their in-game item icon with the title and stats of the crafted item on it, as well as hailing credit to you for your creation. The item will be featured as an actual item that can be manufactured by or purchased by other players for the life of the game. You will receive all entitlements to this point and receive the "Master" medallion. (Note item names cannot violate copyright, trademark or any intellectual property)

Legend: You\u2019ve been with us so far you should probably be written into the history books. With so much lore in Etherell, so many ancient ruins and the founding blocks of the planet that have been passed down through the ages there is bound to be a little bit of your family somewhere in the past. Legends will literally be a part of the history of Etherell (a true Legend of Etherell!). Be it a founding father of a town, a long lost knight from days long gone or perhaps a villainous ruler that once burned the largest city on the continent to the ground. Our writers will craft your ideas into the historical literature of Antavia and you\u2019ll see your name written into actual quests in the game. Even better, we\u2019ll send you the draft and finalized script of the quest(s) where your name is instanced. Not enough? Fine we\u2019ll take a screenshot of the quest giver, the title of the quest and the actual quest pop up screen as well as a map for where the quest giver is so you can find them on your own and prove that you are in fact the stuff of legends. We reserve the right to creatively work your name, in whole or in part, into the story to best suit our overall design. You will receive all entitlements to this point and receive the "Legend" medallion. (Note legend names cannot violate copyright, trademark or any intellectual property)

Creator: You\u2019ll have the privilege of creating the name, look and attitude of one of only 10 "Rare Non-Player Characters" that every player in the game will interact with and be immortalized forever as a founding character in the game. You\u2019ll work directly with the Art Director, Chad Dulac, to create the look of this one of a kind NPC, selecting their race, ethnicity, color scheme, clothing, weapons (if applicable) and personal demeanor. Once it has been created, our art team will color the art, and send you the original hand drawn (and signed) conceptual artwork and a digital colored print that identifies you as the donator and bears your personally selected name. We\u2019ll also send you digital creation images of your NPC and finished colored and textured screenshots bearing your NPC\u2019s name and look. You will also receive all entitlements from Master and below and receive the "Creator" medallion. (Note character names cannot violate copyright, trademark or any intellectual property)

Immortal: Heroes must face villains and when all is said and done they must drop gear. That gear could be yours... LITERALLY! Pledges at this level are able to create the name of one piece of eight that will drop from the final boss in LoE: Antavia. Four slots are armor, four slots are weapons. After you\u2019ve got a name, you\u2019ll work directly with the Art Director Chad Dulac to create the look of this one of a kind piece of gear. Once it has been created, our art team will color the art, and send you the original hand drawn (and signed) conceptual artwork and a digital colored print that identifies you as the donator and bears your personally selected name. We\u2019ll also send you digital creation images of your IMMORTAL gear and finished colored and textured screenshots bearing your IMMORTAL gear\u2019s name and look. Note these rewards may go fast so if you want to ensure you get to create the gear of your choice, pledge now. You will also receive all entitlements from Master and below and receive the "Immortal" medallion. (Note Immortal Gear names cannot violate copyright, trademark or any intellectual property)
